Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: Condition/Problem/DiagnosisCodes
Title: Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
Descriptino: Example value set for Condition/Problem/Diagnosis codes.

Name: Jurisdiction ValueSet
Title: Jurisdiction
Descriptino: This value set defines a base set of codes for country, country subdivision and region    for indicating where a resource is intended to be used.             Note: The codes for countries and country subdivisions are taken from    [ISO 3166](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html)    while the codes for "supra-national" regions are from    [UN Standard country or area codes for statistical use (M49)](http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/m49/m49.htm).

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LinkType
Title: LinkType
Descriptino: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

Name: ListEmptyReasons
Title: List Empty Reasons
Descriptino: General reasons for a list to be empty. Reasons are either related to a summary list (i.e. problem or medication list) or to a workflow related list (i.e. consultation list).

Name: PatientMedicineChangeTypes
Title: Patient Medicine Change Types
Descriptino: Example Item Flags for the List Resource. In this case, these are the kind of flags that would be used on a medication list at the end of a consultation.

Name: ListMode
Title: ListMode
Descriptino: The processing mode that applies to this list.

Name: ListOrderCodes
Title: List Order Codes
Descriptino: Base values for the order of the items in a list resource.

Name: ListStatus
Title: ListStatus
Descriptino: The current state of the list.

Name: Marital Status Codes
Title: MaritalStatus
Descriptino: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

Name: PatientContactRelationship
Title: Patient Contact Relationship
Descriptino: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

Name: ResearchStudyObjectiveType
Title: ResearchStudyObjectiveType
Descriptino: Codes for the kind of study objective.

Name: ResearchStudyPhase
Title: ResearchStudyPhase
Descriptino: Codes for the stage in the progression of a therapy from initial experimental use in humans in clinical trials to post-market evaluation.

Name: ResearchStudyPrimaryPurposeType
Title: ResearchStudyPrimaryPurposeType
Descriptino: Codes for the main intent of the study.

Name: ResearchStudyReasonStopped
Title: ResearchStudyReasonStopped
Descriptino: Codes for why the study ended prematurely.

Name: ResearchStudyStatus
Title: ResearchStudyStatus
Descriptino: Codes that convey the current status of the research study.

Name: CollectionTypeVS
Title: Collection Type
Descriptino: Enumerated list of Collection types

Name: ResearchDataAccessCodeVS
Title: Research Data Access Codes
Descriptino: Enumerated list of access codes such as dbGaP consent codes among others.

Name: StudyNameTypeVS
Title: Study Name Type
Descriptino: Some common types of study 'names'.

Name: StudyPersonnelRoleVS
Title: Study Personnel Role
Descriptino: Roles associated with study personnel.
